ing: 1 IdahoanÂ® Buttery Homestyle Mashed Potato Cup
des: "Grilled hot dogs on potato bread buns are topped with mashed potatoes with mustard and your choice of toppings."
ins: Grill hot dogs until done. Prepare Idahoan Buttery Homestyle Mashed Potato Cup according to package directions and stir in stone ground mustard. Place not dog on bun and spread potato mixture on top. Add toppings to your taste. No ketchup needed!
